text: Twice Is Not Enough is the eleventh studio album by power electronics band Whitehouse, released in 1991 through Susan Lawly. The album cover, depicting a dog sitting on a bed, was drawn by Trevor Brown, and references multiple different murders performed by serial killers. In 1999, the album was reissued as a special edition CD with bonus tracks, all of which originated from the band's 1992 album Never Forget Death, which was out-of-print by that point in time. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== *William Bennett - vocals, synthesizers, production *Peter Sotos - lyrics *Dave Kenny - production *Steve Albini - production (on "Neronia") *Scorpio - production (on "Fanatics") *Alan Gifford - graphic design *Denis Blackham - mastering *Trevor Brown - artwork ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 albums Category:Whitehouse (band) albums
title: Twice Is Not Enough
